data.message: Re: Facebook's "action plan": Who are the third-party groups and what criteria will they use to mark stories as false?  In what way will you determine which pages or stories can or cannot be trusted and shared?  What assurance do we have that this is not simply censorship?

replies.message: Thanks for your question, Tim. Community members can report news stories as false. We have tips and guidelines to help community members determine which stories might be fake, which you can find here: http://bit.ly/2ALwu7V. -Kiara
